translations: adj.愚蠢的，荒谬的；滑稽可笑的；荒诞派的

sentences.sentence: He has a good sense of the absurd.
sentences.translation: 他对荒诞事物有较强的识别能力。

sentences.sentence: Of course it's not true, what an absurd idea.
sentences.translation: 那当然不合乎事实，这个想法太荒唐了！

sentences.sentence: His high-flown style just sounds absurd today.
sentences.translation: 他的浮夸风格如今听起来真是荒谬。
